official_title: To transfer the ownership of the Ship Shoal Lighthouse to the City of Berwick.
short_title: Ship Shoal Lighthouse, Louisiana Transfer Act of 1991

summary.text: Ship Shoal Lighthouse, Louisiana Transfer Act of 1991 - Provides for the transfer, without consideration, to the city of Berwick, Louisiana, of all rights, title, and interest of the United States in the Ship Shoal Lighthouse, Louisiana.

titles.title: Ship Shoal Lighthouse, Louisiana Transfer Act of 1991
To transfer the ownership of the Ship Shoal Lighthouse to the City of Berwick.
